thread.section_title: Viking Bags Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Viking Bags | vikingbags.com | 8 of 138
thread.title: CK

author: CK
title: CK
text: While browsing the Viking Bags site, a "live chat" window popped up and "David" offered to help with any questions I might have. I was browsing from Canada and told "David" that. I asked if the flat shipping charge of $99 included all taxes and duties and I asked twice just to be sure. I was assured TWICE that there would be no additional cost and the only change in the posted prices would be to convert USD to CND. I placed my order with anticipation of getting my Viking Bags. Unfortunately, "David" was incorrect and when the bags arrived at my door I incurred an additional $89.50 CND charge in order to get my package....duty! Definitely disappointed that I was misinformed.
